precondition: The Windows XP desktop is displayed.
A right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active, displaying options for screen saver selection, wait time, and a preview.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu is visible, currently displaying 'Windows XP'.
action: Click the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu, and then select '(None)' from the list.
expected_results: The selected screensaver in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will change to '(None)'. A yellow pop-up window titled 'Keep your computer up to date' will appear at the bottom of the screen.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the 'None' option in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will close and the 'Wait' time will change to '10' minutes.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab active.
action: Click the button labeled "Power..." in the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: A new window titled "Power Options Properties" will open. The "Display Properties" window will remain open but some elements will become temporarily unusable.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Always On".
expected_results: The selected power scheme will change to "Always On", and the "Turn off monitor" setting will update to "After 20 mins".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Always On" power scheme is selected from the "Power schemes" dropdown menu. The "Turn off hard disks" option is visible and set to "Never".
action: Click on the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of time options. Additionally, the "Turn off monitor" and "System standby" options will change from "Never" to dropdown menus with time ranges.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab active. The "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the information icon next to the "System standby" option.
expected_results: A pop-up box titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Apply" button is highlighted.
expected_results: A yellow pop-up notification with the message "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click on any area of the screen outside the "Power Options Properties" window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will lose focus, and the window behind it will become active.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
